name: Four Cheese Corn Dip
author: Idahoan
summary: This Four Cheese Corn Dip is sure to be a favorite at any picnic, potluck, or tailgate party! Keep it in an insulated carrier to ensure hot dip on the spot.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) package Idahoan® Four Cheese Flavored Mashed Potatoes
1 (8 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, reserving half for the topping
directions: Prepare Idahoan Four Cheese Mashed Potatoes with 1 1/2 cups boiling water and prepared chicken gravy
Fold in corn and half of the shredded cheese
Place in buttered baking dish, top with remaining cheddar cheese and sprinkle with paprika
Bake until cheese turns bubbly and golden brown
